mapper.select: SELECT spawning_date FROM mtrace.history_number WHERE result_code = "INFO-0000"

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over ( ORDER BY report_time desc ) as num, report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method FROM mtrace.history_number
) a where a.num between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+19

SELECT report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method FROM mtrace.history_number WHERE spawning_date = #{spawningDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtrace.history_number ( report_time, result_code, result_msg, egg_hist_no, business_no, license_no, farm_id_no, egg_usage, spawning_date, storage_method, egg_xxl, egg_xl, egg_l, egg_m, egg_s, egg_e, washing_method ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{resultCode}, #{resultMsg}, #{eggHistNo}, #{businessNo}, #{licenseNo}, #{farmIdNo}, #{eggUsage}, #{spawningDate}, #{storageMethod}, #{eggXxl}, #{eggXl}, #{eggL}, #{eggM}, #{eggS}, #{eggE}, #{washingMethod} )
